    BikeSimApp - Class in org.bikesim

    F

    forward() - Method in class org.bikesim.entities.Bike
    Uses the showNextPos() method to move the position forward based on current coordinates and direction creating new x y states
    ForwardCommand - Class in org.bikesim.commands
    Implements the command pattern to tell the simulator to move the vehicle forward.
    ForwardCommand() - Constructor for class org.bikesim.commands.ForwardCommand
     

    G

    getDir() - Method in class org.bikesim.commands.PlaceCommand
    The getter function for the direction
    getDir() - Method in class org.bikesim.entities.Bike
    Retrieves the direction of the bike object
    getNextPos() - Method in class org.bikesim.entities.Bike
    Retrieves the x y coordinates of the bike object if it moves forward by invoking the showNextPos helper function
    getPos() - Method in class org.bikesim.entities.Bike
    Retrieves the x y coordinates of the bike object
    getX() - Method in class org.bikesim.commands.PlaceCommand
    The getter function for the x coordinate
    getY() - Method in class org.bikesim.commands.PlaceCommand
    The getter function for the y coordinate
    Grid - Record Class in org.bikesim.entities
    Grid is the entity we will be using for state size and boundary management
    Grid(int, int) - Constructor for record class org.bikesim.entities.Grid
    Constructor for the grid, sets the width and height for the grid

    I

    isValidPos(int, int) - Method in record class org.bikesim.entities.Grid

    P

    parse(String) - Method in class org.bikesim.parser.CommandParser
    Validates and converts strings to commands (PLACE, FORWARD, TURN_LEFT, TURN_RIGHT and GPS_REPORT)
    place(int, int, Direction) - Method in class org.bikesim.entities.Bike
    Can be use to create and replace the object's x and y coordinates, and directions state
    PlaceCommand - Class in org.bikesim.commands
     
    PlaceCommand(int, int, Direction) - Constructor for class org.bikesim.commands.PlaceCommand
    The constructor for this implement, sets the x y coordinate, and the direction to be used with the placeVehicle() function in the simulator.
    placeVehicle(int, int, Direction) - Method in class org.bikesim.simulator.Simulator
    Check if provided x and y coordinates and direction are valid relative to the grid boundaries (invokes the bike's isValidPos()).

    turnVehicleLeft() - Method in class org.bikesim.simulator.Simulator

    turnVehicleRight() - Method in class org.bikesim.simulator.Simulator
